author: BeSoccer
title: Yamal restores Barcelona's chances after Eric Garcia's red card
text: Yamal restores Barcelona's chances after Eric Garcia's red card [BeSoccer](https://www.besoccer.com/writer/besoccer)1 hour ago 9.9k | Reading time: minutes Champions League Jor. 1 LaLiga Jor. 7 Ligue 1 Jor. 5 MLS Jor. 33 Premier League Jor. 5 Eric García D CB George Ilenikhena F ST Lamine Yamal F RW W. Singo D RM L. Camara MF CM Barcelona LaLiga Monaco Ligue 1 Real Madrid LaLiga Arsenal Premier League Stade Brestois Ligue 1 Reading time: minutes [Barcelona](https://www.besoccer.com/team/barcelona) got into trouble. Monaco celebrated the earliest dismissal in the Catalan side's continental history with Eric Garcia sent off until Lamine Yamal scored his first Champions League goal. Marc-Andre ter Stegen exceeded his confidence levels on the ball and Takumi Minamino was on hand to make it 1-0 in the goalmouth. A situation that forced the No.24 to react and leave his side a man down in the 10th minute of the match. With [Monaco](https://www.besoccer.com/team/monaco) 1-0 up and down to ten men, Lamine Yamal took the team on his back for a change. He took advantage of Marc Casado's long run to cut inside his left foot and beat Philipp Kohn at the near post. The No.19 celebrated his first Champions League appearance with the whole of the second half still to play. [September 19, 2024]

author: Ron Johnson
title: Thousand Releases Tiny Perfect Handlebar Bag Made From Old Billboards
text:
In a world where sustainability meets style, cycling brands are finding creative ways to merge the two. The latest collaboration between Thousand , a vintage-inspired helmet brand, and Rareform , known for their upcycled handbags, brings a fresh addition to the cycling community: a limited-edition Crossbody Handlebar Bag . This eco-friendly, multi-functional accessory is made from recycled billboards, offering cyclists a durable, weather-resistant storage option while on the move.
The bag, constructed entirely from upcycled billboards sourced across the U.S., is a unique fusion of form and function. Rareform, which diverts over 11,000 billboards from landfills each month, has long been a leader in repurposing materials that would otherwise go to waste. The result? No two bags are alike. Each one offers its own distinct pattern, making it a true one-of-a-kind accessory for any cyclist.
A Bag that Adapts to Your Ride
More than just a pretty face, this bag is designed for versatility. Whether you’re on your daily commute or heading out for a weekend ride, the Crossbody Handlebar Bag easily transitions from bike to body. The clever design allows you to quickly disengage the handlebar hardware and convert it into a crossbody bag. The ergonomically angled strap tucks neatly into an interior pocket while you’re riding, keeping things sleek and hassle-free.
This thoughtful blend of practicality and design makes it an ideal companion for urban cyclists, bike commuters, or anyone who values functional, sustainable gear.
For more great gear check out this article .
Built for the Elements
The recycled billboard material isn’t just environmentally friendly—it’s also waterproof. With a water-repellent outer shell, cyclists can rely on this bag to protect their gear from the elements, whether caught in an unexpected downpour or riding through the morning mist. The bag’s two-liter storage capacity is perfect for carrying essentials like your phone, wallet, keys, and small snacks.
Safety, as always, is paramount for Thousand, and this bag reflects that with a reflective front logo, enhancing visibility during low-light rides. It’s a small but important detail that urban cyclists will appreciate.
For more information on the new Crossbody Handlebar Bag, go here .

author: Amondi Aroko
title: Kenyan Pastor Harrison Ng'ang'a Denies Government Sponsored Benny Hinn's Crusade: "We're Privileged"
text: Kenyan Pastor Harrison Ng'ang'a Denies Government Sponsored Benny Hinn's Crusade: "We're Privileged" - In 2023, Benny Hinn announced that First Lady Rachel Ruto had invited him to a crusade with everything sponsored by the government - However, local preachers, led by pastor Harrison Ng'ang'a, while anointing the venue for the crusade, changed the message and maintained the church was responsible for the event - His statement divided Kenyans as some reminded him of what the American televangelist said while others asked whom they shall trust to speak the truth Kenyan preacher Harrison Ng'ang'a has denied claims that the government has sponsored televangelist Benny Hinn's Kenyan crusade. The American preacher is expected to host his crusade on February 24 and 25 at Nyayo Stadium, with more than 50,000 people expected to attend the event. Who is sponsoring Benny Hinn's Kenyan crusade His visit to Kenya started when he took to social media to announce that First Lady [Rachel Ruto](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/rachel-ruto/) [travelled to the US to invite him](https://www.tuko.co.ke/kenya/521769-rachel-ruto-invites-popular-preacher-benny-hinn-nationwide-govt-sponsored-crusade/) to host a crusade. PAY ATTENTION: [Stay informed and follow us on Google News!](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEPP2kdduXXNp-3pbIY7sm6cqFAgKIhDz9pHXbl1zaft6WyGO7Jun?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US%3Aen) While cleansing the stadium, Kenyan preachers emphasised that the local churches were the main organisers of the crusade. Pastor Harrison also reminded Kenyans that Hinn had last visited the country two decades ago, and his return was a privilege. He said: "He is an American evangelist, teacher and author of best selling books. He has impacted the world for more than five decades with the life saving and miracle working messages of the gospel of Jesus Christ. He returns to Kenya after being here two decades ago and we the churches of Kenya are privileged to host him. The steering committee is working with key stakeholders to host over 60,000 Kenyans. This event has been organised, funded and coordinated by the churches of Kenya which include both main stream churches and evangelical churches in Kenya." Watch the video below: Here are some of the [comments](https://www.tuko.co.ke/361693-150-comments-boys-pic-instagram.html) from social media users: @julietsteve639 said: "Benni Himself announced that the First Lady went to his country and asked him to come to Kenya. He continued to say that the government hosts him." @Mary Kamau said: "I don't know why I feel worried about this crusade." @janewambui783 said: "Are Kenyan pastors not enough to pray for Kenya? Must we import even preaching." @clemons said: "Do we believe you or Benny Hinn?" @Simpson said: "But Benny Hinn announced it himself. First Lady went to request him to come. Sasa hawa wanasema nini." @Adallaxxz said: "Do you want to say that there is no anointed man of God here in Kenya who can conduct prayers. Kenyans don't be deceived." @muthoni said: "Let's see how he is going to impact Kenya other than using Kenyan taxpayers' money." Pastor Ezekiel says he'll attend crusade Elsewhere, New Life Prayer Centre and Church leader [Pastor Ezekiel](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/pastor-ezekiel/) Odero has confirmed that he will be [attending the anticipated mega crusade](https://www.tuko.co.ke/entertainment/celebrities/538767-pastor-ezekiel-confirms-ll-attend-benny-hinns-mage-crusade-tells-kenyans-respect-ministers/) by Hinn. The Kilifi-based preacher, while talking to some members of his church, asked Kenyans to respect ministers of God who have since been considered pioneers. Ezekiel also urged members of his church to ensure that they attend the crusade that is scheduled to be held this weekend. Source: TUKO.co.ke

author: alejandro morteo
title: ¡México por encima de EU en Ranking FIFA! ¿Cumple Javier Aguirre? Escala el Tricolor en conteo mensual de selecciones
text: ¡México por encima de EU en Ranking FIFA! ¿Cumple Javier Aguirre? Escala el Tricolor en conteo mensual de selecciones El combinado azteca, ahora bajo el mando del ‘Vasco’ y Rafael Márquez, ascendió al lugar 17 del listado que publica el máximo órgano rector del futbol internacional Javier Aguirre ha iniciado su tercera etapa como director técnico de la Selección Mexicana, y tras los recientes partidos contra Nueva Zelanda y Canadá, el equipo azteca se mantiene en el puesto 17 del ranking mensual de la FIFA, superando así a Estados Unidos. [Con una contundente victoria de 3-0 sobre Nueva Zelanda](https://vanguardia.com.mx/deportes/mexico-inicia-con-el-pie-derecho-la-era-de-javier-aguirre-con-triunfo-3-0-sobre-nueva-zelanda-AA13138679) y un empate sin goles ante Canadá, México logró conservar su posición en la clasificación. Por otro lado, Estados Unidos descendió dos lugares tras sufrir una derrota ante Canadá y empatar con Nueva Zelanda. En el contexto de la Concacaf, el Tricolor se posiciona como el mejor clasificado en el lugar 17, mientras que Estados Unidos ocupa el puesto 18. Panamá se encuentra en el lugar 37, mientras que Canadá está más abajo, a pesar de haber tenido un rendimiento superior en sus últimas presentaciones. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [¿Volverá Julio Urías a la cárcel? Sale a la luz el video de la agresión del exlanzador de Dodgers a su esposa en LA](https://vanguardia.com.mx/deportes/volvera-julio-urias-a-la-carcel-sale-a-la-luz-el-video-de-la-agresion-del-exlanzador-de-dodgers-a-su-esposa-en-la-JE13249550) El equipo mexicano había estado por debajo de las “Barras y las Estrellas” durante casi dos años en el ranking. La FIFA ha revelado los cambios en la clasificación internacional, destacando que el equipo norteamericano ha caído al puesto 18, mientras que la Selección Nacional se mantiene en su posición desde la publicación anterior del ranking el 18 de julio. La última vez que el Tri estuvo por encima de Estados Unidos fue en octubre de 2022, poco antes del inicio de la Copa Mundial de Qatar. En ese entonces, México ocupaba el puesto 13 con 1645 puntos, mientras que Estados Unidos estaba en el 16 con 1627 puntos. Antes del ranking de octubre de 2022, México se enfrentó a Paraguay, Perú y Colombia, logrando solo una victoria contra Perú y sufriendo derrotas ante Paraguay y Colombia. ARGENTINA SIGUE DOMINANDO EL RANKING FIFA HASTA EL MES DE SEPTIEMBRE Por otro lado, Argentina continúa liderando la clasificación [FIFA ](https://x.com/FIFAcom)sin cambios en los primeros 10 puestos. Francia ocupa el segundo lugar y España el tercero. La Albiceleste, a pesar de haber perdido ante Colombia (2-1), se mantiene firme al frente. Francia también sufrió una derrota ante Italia (1-3) pero luego venció a Bélgica (2-0) en la Liga de Naciones. España empató con Serbia (0-0) y ganó a Suiza (1-4), manteniéndose cerca del liderato. Inglaterra sigue tras Argentina con dos victorias sobre República de Irlanda (0-2) y Finlandia (2-0), mientras que Brasil ocupa la quinta posición después de perder contra Paraguay (1-0) la semana pasada. En los primeros 20 puestos también aparecen Uruguay (12), seguidos por Croacia, Alemania, Marruecos, Suiza, Japón, [México](https://x.com/miseleccionmx), Estados Unidos, Irán y Dinamarca. Bolivia también destaca al escalar seis posiciones hasta el puesto 83 como el país que más puntos ha sumado recientemente (35.20). Con información de ESPN

author: Фото Сергей Лантюхов; NEWS ru
title: Более 11 тысяч российских школ недовольны доступом к интернету
text:
Свыше 25 тысяч образовательных учреждений в России обеспечены услугами связи не в полном объеме, заявили в пресс-службе Счетной палаты РФ по итогам проверки расходов федерального бюджета на подключение образовательных организаций и избирательных комиссий к интернету. Там напомнили, что регулярные проверки проводятся по поручению президента РФ Владимира Путина.
Как показал опрос более 25 тысяч образовательных организаций общего и среднего специального образования, потребности в услугах связи обеспечены не в полном объеме, —
[подчеркнули]в палате.
Как оказалось, 44,6% опрошенных образовательных организаций, а именно 11 362 учебных учреждения, не считают скорость передачи данных в Сети достаточной для нормальной работы и удовлетворения всех потребностей. При этом 2,2% (558 учебных учреждений) отметили, что на предоставленной скорости невозможно полноценно использовать интернет.
Также в рамках проверки было установлено, что не во всех школах скорость доступа к информационным системам и интернету соответствует скорости, прописанной в госконтрактах. Например, в 26 учебных заведениях Рязанской и Псковской областей пропускная способность каналов связи ниже, чем требуется.
Ранее сообщалось, что МТС запустила первую российскую базовую станцию 5G. Как заявила глава телекоммуникационной компании Инесса Галактионова, в России затянули с внедрением 5G, но это дает стране возможность изучить опыт других государств и учесть их ошибки, которых было достаточно.

author: Justin Welch, Managing Editor
title: OPINION: Manipulating misinformation and rising death tolls
text: In the midst of one of the state’s worst ever natural disasters, relief, volunteers and well wishes have poured into North Carolina. In a time of absolute calamity and suffering, people across the world have come together to demonstrate the very best of humanity to support our state. Well, almost all of humanity. While regular people have rushed to help North Carolinians, some of our country and state’s foremost political leaders rushed to capitalize on the tragedy. Of course leading the way was the ever-ethical, morally upstanding leader of the Republican Party, former President Donald Trump. In the days that followed Hurricane Helene’s landfall in North Carolina and the surrounding states, Trump was spewing every form of lie and conspiracy he could muster in an attempt to see what would stick. You’ve probably seen something about the government only offering disaster victims $750 on social media, a gross misconstruction of the process perpetuated by Trump. This is easily debunkable , and while victims are able to receive this payment, there is much more support to follow in the relief process. He took a few leaps of logic from there to say the Biden Administration and various Democratic leaders weren’t working to provide aid at all, saying Vice President Kamala Harris had stolen money from FEMA to give to illegal immigrants. Very classy. In the most valiant use of his platform, the former president claimed Gov. Roy Cooper was going out of his way to not help people in conservative areas, and “targeting” Republican voters. This kind of rhetoric is beyond disgusting and a reprehensible exploitation of politics that spits on the American tradition of rising above partisan divisions in times of tragedy. From the most documented liar in history, you’d think people would know it’s not true . Of course, Trump’s cult following has doubled down to spread these fabrications far and wide. This has become such a trend in the aftermath of the storms that FEMA, whose attention should probably be on real-life disaster relief, has had to start an entire “ rumor response ” webpage to dispel misinformation. You may have seen Marjorie Taylor Greene — in her typical rational fashion — claim the hurricane and weather in general was controlled by “them,” and intentionally targeted red voting districts. Yes, Democrats in Washington can barely figure out how to staple a piece of paper together, but of course they can bend the Earth’s atmosphere to their will like Greek Gods. Or maybe she was talking about Jews again, who knows. Speaking of antisemitism, Mark Robinson might not be good at clearing his search history, but he’s great at sniffing out the political opportunity in his constituents dying. With Robinson’s campaign torpedoing after being outed as a pro-slavery pervert Nazi, the Lieutenant Governor rushed to the mountains for a photo-op in hopes to shift the narrative. His narrative toed right in-line with his party’s presidential nominee. In addition to lying about the government’s outreach and involvement in the state’s recovery, Robinson levied unsubstantiated accusations at the media for not reporting on rural parts of North Carolina. All before failing to fulfill his duty as an elected official and skipping votes to authorize a state of emergency. This isn’t all to say FEMA is an infallible organization and that the government’s response has been faultless. I’m not on the ground in Western North Carolina, and bureaucracy in times of crisis will always have its limits. But these allegations are so detestably untrue that a rabbit with an iPod Touch could deduct their true intentions. The strategy of Trump and his allies is clear, and nothing new for the brand: fear-mongering manipulation through blatant deception. Trump does not have anything close to a plan for any of the issues he rages on about. He derailed bipartisan efforts to address the border crisis because it was politically inconvenient for the government to find real solutions through governing. He wants to get rid of Medicaid and has no plan to replace it. Every economist that analyzes his financial plans has no idea what he is talking about. He makes empty promises without premise and says the other side will murder you with immigrants and crime. It is nothing new — actually, it’s a well-documented historical Republican strategy. Though a few weeks have passed and Helene victims have become second fiddle to whatever xenophobic delusion or whichever deceased golfer’s penis he wakes up focusing on, the consequences of his rhetoric rage on in North Carolina. FEMA was forced to temporarily suspend relief efforts in parts of the state because of threats born from the rampant misinformation. Trump intentionally sewing mistrust into government institutions to cause chaos is another prominent fascist theme of his political career. His tirade against public health during the pandemic was another episode that, again, had incredibly serious implications. People living in Trump-heavy counties were three times as likely to die from COVID-19. Medical experts predict 40% of the deaths the country faced could have been averted if not for Trump’s mishandling and misinformation. If you think those are too circumstantial of examples, there are actual academic studies that tracked how many people died from COVID after attending Trump rallies in 2020. What studies and reports will we see from North Carolina after Helene? How many will die from his intentional ignorance to the truth, telling vulnerable people to fear the people desperately trying to help? So I frame this sentiment for the reader, and hopefully for the potential Trump voter: He is killing you, he is politically profiting off of your death and he is laughing at you behind your back. In all likelihood, Trump will carry North Carolina for a third general election in a row. His “Martin Luther King on steroids” Mark Robinson will likely lose the gubernatorial election, but not without amassing hundreds of thousands of votes first. A large portion of our state will vote for, again, a self-pronounced Nazi. N-A-Z-I. North Carolina, my friends and colleagues who I know want to vote for Trump, I implore you to have an honest reflection on the effect this singular individual has had on our state. On the condition of political discourse and the lunacy it now requires to engage in it. I’m not asking you to vote for someone else, just to not vote for the Nazi-endorsing, psychotic tyrant-hopeful who's making a painstakingly obvious attempt to take advantage of you and our state.

author: /news/author/tipranksaustraliannewsdesk
title: Enova Mining Unveils Major Titanium Discoveries at CODA Projects
text:
Enova Mining Limited ( (AU:ENV) ) just unveiled an announcement.
Enova Mining Limited has announced significant findings from its drilling projects at CODA Central and CODA North, confirming high-grade titanium and rare earth element mineralisation. The results from CODA Central indicate consistent, large-scale mineralisation, enhancing the project’s strategic value and growth potential. Similarly, CODA North continues to show impressive enrichment of titanium and rare earth elements, with conditions favorable for low-cost, large-scale surface mining. These developments reinforce Enova’s position in the critical minerals market and support its strategy to advance its exploration efforts and define substantial resource bases.
More about Enova Mining Limited
Enova Mining Limited is an Australian company operating in the mining industry, focusing on the exploration and development of critical mineral assets. The company is primarily involved in the extraction of titanium and rare earth elements, with a strategic emphasis on expanding its portfolio of these essential resources.
Average Trading Volume: 7,533,577
Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy
Current Market Cap: A$9.19M
